- Be more than or equal to 7 characters long
- Be less than or equal to 128 characters long
- Include both lower and upper case characters
- Include  at least one special character
- Include at least one number

projects.txCompletedStatusSub: You will get your payment once Organization confirms the project completion.
projects.txOrgEndSub: By ending the hire before the completion of the project, the contributor will not get paid. Only proceed if you believe that the work wasn't done accproding to the agreement. Visit our FAQ to learn more.

projects.txProjectAbortedUserSub: {{name}} has aborted this assignement. Your payment will not be processed.

projects.txConfirmCopy: By confirming its completion, the project will end, and *** will receive their payment.
projects.txContestCopy: By contesting the completion of the project, you will trigger a ligitation process.
projects.txContestMini: Only proceed if you believe that the work wasn’t done accproding to the agreement. Visit our FAQ to learn more.
projects.txOrganizationAbortSub: This means you will not get paid. Please confirm or contest this decision.
projects.txSendOfferSub: If *** accepts this offer they will be working on your project.
